question: [Review] Espanol: Di which integer bin occurs most frequently segun el histograma.

qas.question: [Review] Espanol: Di which integer bin occurs most frequently segun el histograma.
[Detailed] Italiano: Riporta how many samples were used in total dal istogramma.
[Focus] Portugues: Informe how many entries fall inside the modal bin com base no histograma.
